title: California National Guard Federalized and Deployed to Los Angeles
summary: President federalized California's National Guard and deployed additional forces to Los Angeles over the Governor's objection; includes 700 Marines deploying to downtown Los Angeles
citations: USNI News — 700 Marines Deploying to Downtown Los Angeles (Jun 9, 2025): https://news.usni.org/2025/06/09/700-marines-deploying-to-downtown-los-angeles

Reuters — Trump says more National Guard troops would be deployed in California if needed (Jun 9, 2025): https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-says-more-national-guard-troops-would-be-deployed-california-if-needed-2025-06-09/
notes: Establishes platform conditions for Stage-5 coercion through domestic military deployment over state objection.
